mode.name: find_all_operations
mode.query: SELECT op.id, op.description, op.status, op.started, op.modified, op.progress, (SELECT COUNT(server_id) FROM rhnSsmOperationServer ops WHERE ops.operation_id = op.id) as server_count FROM rhnSsmOperation op WHERE op.user_id = :user_id

mode.name: find_operations_with_status
mode.query: SELECT op.id, op.description, op.status, op.started, op.modified, op.progress, (SELECT COUNT(server_id) FROM rhnSsmOperationServer ops WHERE ops.operation_id = op.id) as server_count FROM rhnSsmOperation op WHERE op.status = :status AND op.user_id = :user_id

mode.name: find_operation_by_id
mode.query: SELECT op.id, op.description, op.status, op.started, op.modified, op.progress FROM rhnSsmOperation op WHERE op.id = :op_id AND op.user_id = :user_id

write-mode.name: create_operation
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSsmOperation (id, user_id, description, status, started, modified, progress) VALUES ( :op_id, :user_id, :description, :status, sysdate, sysdate, 0 )

write-mode.name: update_status_and_progress
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhnSsmOperation SET status = :status, modified = sysdate, progress = :progress WHERE id = :op_id AND user_id = :user_id

write-mode.name: map_servers_to_operation
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSsmOperationServer (operation_id, server_id) ( SELECT :op_id, element FROM rhnSet WHERE label = :set_label )

mode.name: find_server_data_for_operation_id
mode.query: SELECT s.id, s.name FROM rhnSsmOperationServer sos, rhnServer s WHERE sos.operation_id = :op_id AND s.id = sos.server_id
